seed_pair.target: Es una buena idea intentar respirar despacio.
seed_pair.known: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.

seed_pair.target: Cuando sea que te sientas enojado.
Quien sea que dijo que sería difícil tenía absolutamente razón.
seed_pair.known: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.

seed_pair.target: Es tu turno de llevar la ropa limpia arriba.
seed_pair.known: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.

seed_pair.target: El perro está sucio y mojado.
seed_pair.known: The dog is dirty and wet.

seed_pair.target: Porque ha estado jugando en el barro.
seed_pair.known: Because he has been playing in the mud.

seed_pair.target: Me estoy sintiendo triste en este momento.
seed_pair.known: I am feeling sad at the moment.
Because I have got to be quiet.
